Welcome to the Juicing Revolution

The Hurom Slow Juicer uses its auger like screw to naturally squeeze the juice out of fruits and vegetables without damaging the juice with heat or friction like traditional juicers that use a blade or grinder.

What results is juice which is healthier and fresher; has more antioxidants and vitamins and tastes simply amazing!
